name: vscode-grok
description: Send source files to Grok and a question.

vscodeGrok.apiKey.description: xAI API key for external service integration.

vscodeGrok.model.description: The default xAI model to use with Grok.

vscodeGrok.outputMethod.description: Where to display Grok responses: 'tab' for a new editor tab, 'outputChannel' for the Output panel.

vscodeGrok.showPreview.description: Controls when a preview of the data being sent to the Grok API is displayed. 'always' shows a preview for all requests, 'workspace-only' shows a preview only for requests involving the entire workspace (useful for reviewing large file sets), and 'never' disables the preview entirely. Defaults to 'workspace-only' to balance usability and efficiency, as workspace requests often involve more data.

vscodeGrok.excludeFiles.description:
Exclude files or directories by glob patterns or exact matches from workspace queries.
(e.g., ['**/.vscode/**', '**/node_modules/**', '.gitignore'])

vscodeGrok.includeFiles.description:
Include files or directories by glob patterns or exact matches from workspace queries.
This setting takes precedence over 'vscodeGrok.excludeFiles'.
(e.g., ['**/src/**', '**/.vscode/settings.json', '.dockerignore'])

vscodeGrok.enableStatefulSessions.description: Enable stateful sessions with Grok, allowing context retention across multiple interactions.

vscodeGrok.submitWithEditor.description:
Enable submitting questions via a dedicated editor
window instead of the Command Palette Input Box.
(supports multiline, copy/paste, tab-switching)

vscodeGrok.lastResponseId.description: Last response ID from Grok for stateful sessions.

commands.title: Ask Grok: Workspace
commands.description: Ask Grok a question about the entire workspace.

commands.title: Ask Grok: Current Tab
commands.description: Ask Grok a question about the contents of the currently active editor tab.

commands.title: Ask Grok: Function Under Cursor
commands.description: Ask Grok a question about the function at the cursor position.

commands.title: Ask Grok: Selected Text
commands.description: Ask Grok a question about currently selected text in active tab.

commands.title: Set Grok: Enable Stateful Sessions
commands.description: Enable stateful sessions with Grok, allowing context retention across multiple interactions.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
